name: Red Faction II

files.setup: N/A:Select the Red Faction installer downloaded from GOG

game.exe: drive_c/GOG Games/Red Faction II/Red Faction II.exe

content:
files:
- setup: N/A:Select the Red Faction installer downloaded from GOG
game:
  exe: drive_c/GOG Games/Red Faction II/Red Faction II.exe
installer:
- task:
    name: create_prefix
    prefix: $GAMEDIR
- task:
    args: /SP- /SUPPRESSMSGBOXES /NOCANCEL
    executable: setup
    name: wineexec
    prefix: $GAMEDIR
